title: Why is the Unité d'Habitation in Marseille so famous? - Quora

response.answer_text: There is a very comprehensive wikipedia entry Unité d'habitation - Wikipedia, which answers your question. The main reason for its international fame, is that it is one of the first of its kind that Le Corbusier built. It is actually a quite interesting place to visit, when you are in Marseille. There is a hotel, entirely in Le Corbusier style, still open when I checked just now and a bar and a restaurant. On the roof is an Art Gallery, founded by the artist Ora Ito, called MAMO, worth visiting as well.

They are blocks of housing designed by Le Corbusier. Each apartment was spread over two floors, and were well lit with large windows. Each housing block included communal facilities, where residents could meet each other. Other architects took his ideas and made cheaper, smaller blocks of homes with fewer facilities and cheaper materials.
